post.body: oh my...Im sorry to hear that...does peppermint help?
lol..all musician's do..dont feel bad, just means you play from the heart;-)
Thank you for adding me..looks like some good information on your blog I want to explore further when I have more time:-)
thanks for adding me!!
thanks for the follow:-)!!
Im looking forward to the post- sounds like a great idea..I can see how it could get lengthy tho-might be better in segments
peppermint has long been a folk remedy for tummy trouble
hey St Louis- one of my fave cities!! thanks for adding me!!:-)
eeeww, that does NOT sound appetizing at all...thanks for adding me tho:-)
Thanks for adding me:-)!!
oh my...well ventilated I hope?? That could make you a little groggy in the morning if not;-) Thanks for adding me btw!!
Oh- but before I go, I did want to tweet my latest on Etsy...I just listed my "With Wings as Eagles" pendant http://tinyurl.com/8vo6o3
AND that means now I really AM getting back to work, lol..see you later tout le monde:)
okay, the snow & ice were beautiful,but Im loving this bright sunny warm day too~ glad I work in a treehouse so I can enjoy it even inside;)
Im working on a whole wedding jewelry set in that colour range...I think it will be delightful when finished!! http://tinyurl.com/7w5esa
starting the workday making a couple of these rings for orders: http://tinyurl.com/7w5esa
okay, now I need to pop off an FOCUS on work, lol...have some new Keith Moore sermons I can listen to while I work- YAY
so new years beginning goal...FOCUS and WALK IN THE SPIRIT:-)
When Im focused, I begin my day saying "where do You want me to go, what do You want me to do Father?"....those days are my most successful!
I love what Phil Driscoll said about the Amplified Bible-"its God's favorite, cos He likes it LOUD" ...he was just teasing, but its cute:)
